attributes.action: cap the maximum primary school class size at 20.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have one of the largest average primary school class sizes in the developed world and one of the largest differences between class sizes in the state and private sectors, despite having one of the largest education budgets. Rather than being directed at producing primary national strategies and spending millions on administering SATs, this money could be put to much better use in recruiting more teachers.
